column5: Hi all. Well my 15 yr. old Shumacher charge has passed away .So im looking at a new charger for my tm and starting batteries Any  recomendations appreciated! Oh! and cheap but effective is good! Thanx.
Wow! Almost a hundred views and not one recomendation! Hhhmmmm!  I must have made a mistake and posted on a paddling forum! Lol! Anyway i fixed it! Good as new! Cheers!
How nice to have the silence encourage you to fix it, probably saved you a $100 or more.
Get a NOCO. My son recommended to me. I thought wow that doesn't look like a charger... but it works flawlessly and is light, portable, and easy to use.. https://no.co/
You have to be part of the qlick. LOL
Hhhhummmph!!! You been to the Grand yet! Buddy who just moved back to Newfounland sent my some awsome pics of the specks hes getting! Im heading to the Grand soon!
